name: Norsk Industri / Federation of Norwegian Industries
membership: Orgalime, CEFIC, EUROMETAUX, CEPI, IFIEC, CEPS et al.
goal: Industry and employer's organisation. Taking part in collective bargaining on wages and work condition. Promoting industry friendly and competitive framework conditions.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Industrial policy, environment, climate, energy, transport, research and development, trade, state aid
